root.message: All metadata fields for the indicator 17-19-1, translated into en
root.data: Goal 17. Strengthen the means of implementing and revitalizing the Global Partnership for Sustainable Development17.19 By 2030, build on existing initiatives to establish indicators of progress in sustainable development that would complement gross domestic product, and support statistical capacity building in developing countries17.19.1 Value (in dollars) of all resources allocated to statistical capacity building in developing countries5/1/2020 12:00:00 AMISTEEBUNDAYISENGA ModestSocial studies and statistics and poverty monitoring (ESSSP)ESSSP department manager794019391158 BUJUMBURAndayimode2010@gmail.comValue (in dollars) of all resources allocated to strengthening the statistical capacity of the national statistical systemDollarsISTEEBU, Country report on support to statistics (CRESS), 2016Administrative dataannualannualISTEEBUISTEEBUISTEEBU is the body recognized by the Burundian government for the collection, processing and dissemination of official statistics helping in planning and decision-making.This indicator is relevantValue (in dollars) of all resources allocated to strengthening the statistical capacity of the national statistical systemannualAvailable nationallyThe indicator can be compared to other indicators of the same type at regional and international levelISTEEBU, Country report on support to statistics (CRESS), 2016
